item.title: Kiss - I Was Made For Loving You
item.description:
작곡: Kiss / 작사: Words & Music by
KY: 8102

Yeah—
do do do do do do do
Do do do do do do do
do do do do do do do

do do do do do do do
Tonight I wanna
give it all to you
In the darkness
there’s so much

and tonight

Cause girl

for loving you baby

there’s something

Cause girl
you were made for me
